attributes.action: make provision for free credit checks for the 7.25 million families effected by the recent loss of their personal data.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the loss of computer discs containing the personal and banking details of some 7.25 million families, I believe it is reasonable for the Government to provide annual credit reports in order to allow potential victims of fraud resulting from this situation.  These reports should be issued annually until such a time as the discs are recovered and absolute proof that they have not been accessed has been obtained.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
